```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Subtle typewriter effect only on prompts
    const prompts = document.querySelectorAll('.cli-prompt code');
    prompts.forEach((prompt, index) => {
        // Only apply to first few prompts, with delay
        if (index < 3) {
            const text = prompt.textContent;
            prompt.textContent = '';
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                let i = 0;
                function type() {
                    if (i < text.length) {
                        prompt.textContent += text.charAt(i);
                        i++;
                        setTimeout(type, 50); // Faster typing
                    }
                }
                type();
            }, index * 1000);
        }
    });
    
    // Enhanced hover effects
    const interactiveElements = document.querySelectorAll('.project-item, .thought-item, .newsletter-box');
    interactiveElements.forEach(el => {
        el.addEventListener('mouseenter', function() {
            this.style.transform = 'translateY(-2px)';
            this.style.boxShadow = '0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)';
        });
        el.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
            this.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
            this.style.boxShadow = '';
        });
    });
    
    // Newsletter form functionality
    const newsletterForm = document.querySelector('.newsletter-form form');
    if (newsletterForm) {
        newsletterForm.addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const button = this.querySelector('.cli-button');
            const input = this.querySelector('.cli-input');
            
            button.textContent = 'SENDING...';
            button.style.background = '#f59e0b';
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                button.textContent = 'âœ“ SENT';
                button.style.background = '#22c55e';
                input.value = 'Thank you for subscribing!';
                input.disabled = true;
            }, 1500);
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                button.textContent = 'SEND';
                button.style.background = '';
                input.value = '';
                input.disabled = false;
                input.placeholder = 'your@email.com';
            }, 4000);
        });
    }
});
</script>
```
